Monday 9:30am - 8:30pm Tuesday 9:30am - 8:30pm Sunday 10:00am - 7:00pm Store Features: - [2-Hour Pickup (Curbside or In-Store)](https://www.vitaminshoppe.com/lp/pick-up-in-store) - [Shop Now, Pay Later with Klarna](https://www.vitaminshoppe.com/lp/klarna) - 20% Off for Vets on Military Mondays - [Cash Back Awards from Healthy Awards®](https://www.vitaminshoppe.com/lp/Newhealthyawards) [Follow us on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/supersupplements_westolympia/) [Skip link](#section-browse-by-state) Aromatherapy and essential oils open up a world of tantalizing aromas designed to inspire an environment of relaxation. Immerse your senses in a mist of tranquility when you pair your diffuser with natural essential oils made from popular herbs, plants and fruits. Use specially formulated oil blends for aromatherapy, massage, skin care and beauty. Take your aromatherapy one step further with scented candles and room mists, all available at The Vitamin Shoppe. Our selection of CBD hemp extract oil comes in multiple formats and scented blends for specific purposes. Get CBD hemp oil in rollers for topical application and individual 1-fluid-ounce bottles or multi-bottle sets for diffusing. [Shop CBD Hemp Extract Oil](https://www.vitaminshoppe.com/c/natural-beauty-skin/product-type/essential-oils) Create a spa-like environment in your own home using an aromatherapy diffuser that dispenses a tranquil mist throughout your space. Find easy-to-use diffusers to start breathing in the serene scents of essential oils. [Shop Aromatherapy Diffusers](https://www.vitaminshoppe.com/c/natural-beauty-skin/aromatherapy/diffusers) Carrier oils are used for diluting essential oils so you can apply them topically. Find popular options like almond, grapeseed and jojoba oils and more to create your own mixtures for therapeutic skincare. [Shop Carrier Oils](https://www.vitaminshoppe.com/c/natural-beauty-skin/aromatherapy/carrier-oils) Invigoratingly fresh, lemongrass essential oil packs an uplifting aroma that stimulates the senses, helping you feel awake and inspired. Use this oil with refreshing lemony elements for diffusing on its own or mixing with other oils. [Shop Lemongrass Essential Oil](https://www.vitaminshoppe.com/c/natural-beauty-skin/aromatherapy/essential-oils/scent/lemongrass) Made from the tropical yellow flower that grows on the Cananga tree, ylang ylang essential oil has a deep, rich fragrance with sweet and floral elements. Use tantalizing ylang ylang oils to promote a sense of relaxation and desire. [Shop Ylang Ylang Essential Oil](https://www.vitaminshoppe.com/c/natural-beauty-skin/aromatherapy/essential-oils/scent/ylang-ylang) Awaken your senses with the energizing and uplifting aroma of orange essential oil. Enjoy the fresh citrus scent with the perfect balance of fruity sweetness and vibrant zest.
